![G1lAhlZ.png](http://imgur.com/G1lAhlZ.png)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/GD3v75-nHxI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Enjoy, and please be critical (But not too critical, don't wreck me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)). 

I love drawing by the way.

Enjoy!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-11T16:15:43Z" title="03/11/2015 04:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 11, 2015</time> by DMSP**

I like it!

To be critical, you could use your finger to smooth out some of the rough edges on Kerbin.

I'd suggest the same as above, but using something like toilet paper, a paper towel, a Q-Tip, whatever you've got on hand.

You can get really smooth shading effects like this. For example:

![q9jFslA.png](http://i.imgur.com/q9jFslA.png)

> 
> I like it!
> To be critical, you could use your finger to smooth out some of the rough edges on Kerbin.

> 
> I'd suggest the same as above, but using something like toilet paper, a paper towel, a Q-Tip, whatever you've got on hand.
> You can get really smooth shading effects like this. For example:
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/q9jFslA.png](http://i.imgur.com/q9jFslA.png)

Alright, that sounds good, I'll do that.

Actually, I have no idea what celestial body that is... 

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Anyone?

I have some more but It's kinda lonely over here...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KZ4nDZZLohs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
